channel.title: GreatNameDomain Podcast
channel.description: The GreatNameDomain Podcast. The podcast show that talks about internet tips for domain registration. A weekly podcast looking at the importance of a name with use of different web applications.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The podcast examines the importance of naming domains and hosting on the internet.
channel.itunes:author: Jeff Rigler
channel.itunes:summary: The GreatNameDomain Podcast talks about internet tips for domain name registration. Each week a tip will be added also discussing different web applications

item.title: Greatnamedomain Podcast: What makes Amazon and Yahoo Great Names?
item.itunes:author: Jeff Rigler
item.itunes:subtitle: What makes Amazon and Yahoo Great Names?
item.itunes:summary: What makes Amazon and Yahoo great names? Jeff Discusses Jeffrey Bezo's possible reason for the name Amazon.com Take care when registering your domain name and hosting your website. Your domain name is important. Make it great with GreatNameDomain.com
item.description: What makes Amazon and Yahoo great names? Jeff Discusses Jeffrey Bezo's possible reason for the name Amazon.com Take care when registering your domain name and hosting your website. Your domain name is important. Make it great with GreatNameDomain.comVisit greatnamedomain
item.itunes:keywords: Jeff Rigler, greatnamedomain, technology, domain, tips, Web Design, Video, Photoshop, education

item.title: Greatnamedomain Podcast: Great names in History
item.itunes:author: Jeff Rigler
item.itunes:subtitle: What's in a name? Great names in history.
item.itunes:summary: This week Jeff lists of great names in history. Jeff talks about the importance of names that can evoke a emotional response. Take care when registering your domain name and hosting your website. Your domain name is important. Make it great with GreatNameDomain.com
item.description: This week Jeff lists some of the great names in history. Jeff talks about the importance of names and they can evoke an emotional response. Take care when registering your domain name and hosting your website. Visit greatnamedomain
item.itunes:keywords: Jeff Rigler, greatnamedomain, technology, domain, tips, Web Design, Video, Photoshop, education

item.title: Greatnamedomain Podcast: Episode 1
item.itunes:author: Jeff Rigler
item.itunes:subtitle: An introduction to greatnamedomain podcast. A weekly podcast on tips for domain name registration on the internet.
item.itunes:summary: This week Jeff talks about the importance of the translation of your name to other languages.
item.description: Jeff talks about the importance of choosing a name and how it translates to other languages. Visit greatnamedomain
